data.title: Brittle Books Project
data.meta_description:
The following titles are part of an ongoing effort to photocopy, digitize, and microfilm brittle books from the Libraries' general collection. Preservation will help to ensure long-term access for the University community and beyond. Reformatting efforts are fully supported with funding from the New York State Department of Education.

This list is arranged alphabetically by author's last name, and requires University at Albany credentials for sign-in. These books can also be searched using the Libraries' online catalog.
